Text: Cadillacs trays and other information that will save your life Cc NonPrivilegedpst Confirmed with Charles Alvarez some questions that came up at yesterdays meeting Regarding the elimination of PowerStation this is only for the West Desk not East Desk The Cadillac of Servers is being employed for RPS in order to boost performance It even comes with a longhorn hood ornament The Gigs of space has been reserved for Steve Gullions use Charles says that once were ready to proceed with the Load Database it will not be an issue to get server space and an Oracle database setup for us ie we will notmore than likelyneed to purchase additional hardware Have a great weekend John
